Develop a subscription service that offers a monthly delivery of candles in various sizes and scents, allowing people to easily stock up on their favorites or try new ones.
Design a compact, portable candle that can be used in small spaces like offices, bedrooms, and bathrooms, and has an automatic timer that can work for several hours.
Create a candle that has a built-in diffuser, incorporating aromatherapy oils to enhance the scent and provide additional health benefits.
Create a set of candles that can be easily transformed into home decor pieces by attaching additional candles to create unique displays and arrangements.
Develop a solar-powered candle that is made from eco-friendly materials and can be used as an eco-conscious alternative to traditional candles.
